sections.title: Liberator (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Liberator class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: To the Rescue (Su) (Liberator)
sections.description: As a standard action, grants allies within 30 feet morale bonuses to attack rolls, Escape Artist checks, and saves against fear effects for several rounds.

sections.title: Poison Resistance (Ex) (Liberator)
sections.description: Provides a +2 bonus on saving throws against poison effects, increasing to +4 at 7th level.

sections.title: Lockbreaker (Ex) (Liberator)
sections.description: Grants a competence bonus equal to half class level on Disable Device checks to open locks and Escape Artist checks to escape restraints.

sections.title: Bonus Feat (Liberator)
sections.description: At 3rd level, gains a bonus feat from a specific list including Blind-Fight, Iron Will, or Skill Focus.

sections.title: Silent Sunder (Ex) (Liberator)
sections.description: Allows sunder attacks and breaking objects with Strength checks to make no more noise than normal conversation.

sections.title: Slaver’s Ruin (Ex) (Liberator)
sections.description: Designates creatures engaged in slavery as flat-footed against the liberator's next attack, unless they have immunity to being flat-footed.

sections.title: Greater Sunder (Ex) (Liberator)
sections.description: Ignores half of an object's hardness when sundering and gains a +2 morale bonus on CMB for sunder attempts.

sections.title: Steely Resolve (Ex) (Liberator)
sections.description: Grants a second saving throw attempt one round later when failing saves against charm or compulsion effects.

sections.title: Darkvision (Su) (Liberator)
sections.description: Grants darkvision 60 feet, or increases existing darkvision range by 60 feet if already possessed.

sections.title: Quick Pick (Ex) (Liberator)
sections.description: Allows Disable Device checks to open locks as a move action instead of a full-round action without penalties.

sections.title: Freedom of Movement (Su) (Liberator)
sections.description: Permanently treated as under freedom of movement spell effects, plus once per day can cast freedom of movement as a spell-like ability.
